entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 24.
